title: Human Resources Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 7 weeks. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory) in Sept 2022
Interview Descriptions: I recently did an interview with WBG for a HRBP position. It was a 4 panel member interview. The questions are mainly competency based questions. Example describe a time you made a mistake with serious implication, what was the mistake, how did you manage it and what was the outcome? I will encourage anyone preparing for such interview to attend prepared. Study the JD and ensure you have two questions set for the competencies listed on the advert. One positive and one negative.
Interview Questions: What are some of the competencies required for the role? What would be your greatest challenge in this role? Describe your experience in managing work related conflicts, what have you learned? What is your greatest achievement, the one that you are most proud of?

title: M&E Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied through an employee referral. The process took 2 months. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory)
Interview Descriptions:
Apply to position advert with cover letter and CV
One interview - review of experience, skills and knowledge of M&E and questions on how to strengthen data use at health facilities
Interview Questions: Tell us about yourself and what makes you best suited for this role

title: Senior Software Developer Interview
Interview Descriptions: Very nice and smooth.  I like the way the whole process was handled. From the invite we were asked to submit all our documents in one pdf and can reach out to the hr manager anytime for questions as the case may be

title: Senior Program Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory) in Oct 2018
Interview Descriptions: It was a very interactive and comfortable process, the interviewwers made me feel comfortable during the interviwe session, there was no form of intimidation, the process went smoothly. I was asked if I had any question for them at the end of the interview session.
Interview Questions: why did you apply for the job/role?

title: Assistant Technical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Maiduguri, Borno) in Jan 2018
Interview Descriptions: The process was seamless. It was a one stage interview where both technical questions and HT questions were asked. The process took about 20 minutes. The major questions centered around supply chain management
Interview Questions: Mention the best treatment option for malaria

title: Finance Assistant Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory) in Jan 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very organized. Screening done after accounting skills test. We were 30 and screened to 5 at the end. After whivh we had a panel interview with finance and hr personnel.
Interview Questions: What would you do scenario questions

title: Data Entry Clerk Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Niger) in Mar 2015
Interview Descriptions: It was not too tense. The applicant needs to be extra-prepared and composes foe the job. Knowledge of the organization's operation is equally imperative. Thus, an hour dedication to Fhi360 website would do.
Interview Questions: What innovation do you want to bring to this job?

title: Program Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied online. The process took 4 months. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Lagos) in Feb 2015
Interview Descriptions: Hiring was a bit slow and interviews kept being repeated. A telephone interview followed a face to face interview and they weren't readily forthcoming with post interview feedback. On the flipside, once they had taken a decision, the rest of the process was quite speedily smooth.
Interview Questions: How will you resolve conflict between the organization and government stakeholders?

title: Technical Officer Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at FHI 360 (Abuja, Federal Capital Territory) in Sept 2013
Interview Descriptions:
Submit your Resume and if you are qualified, you are contacted. 
My interview was over the phone and the questions were basically to assess my knowledge of the position I was applying for and to check my human resource experiences and skills
Interview Questions: How would I handle an employee who flout the organization policy

title: Assistant Technical Officer Interview
Application Type: I applied in-person. The process took 2 weeks. I interviewed at FHI 360 (Lagos) in Aug 2013
Interview Descriptions: There was definitely use of some scare tactics but overall not too bad. Just be confident with yourself. Multiple people in the room, questions all related to the job experience. If you say you know how to do something make sure you are certain, they will ask.
Interview Questions: How many years experience do you have working with HIV and HIV related illnesses
